Package org.jcatapult.email.service

Interface Summary
EmailCommand Interface for the EmailCommand object.
EmailService This interface defines how to send emails in a simple and templatized manner.
EmailTransportService This interface defines the transport mechanism for sending email messages.
TimeCommand This interface defines time metrics for waiting for emails to be sent.
 

Class Summary
FreeMarkerEmailCommand
FreeMarkerEmailService This class implements the EmailService interface and generates emails using FreeMarker.
JavaMailEmailTransportService This class implements the EmailTransportService interface using the JavaMail API and a JavaMail session.
JavaMailEmailTransportService.EmailRunnable The callable for handling async message sending.
 

Exception Summary
JCatapultEmailException Thrown from the JavaMailEmailTransportService on exception User: jhumphrey Date: Apr 21, 2008
